title: Fireside With The Underboss - "NYE 1968, Carmine Gets Shot In The Head In My Car"
description: Sammy and his friend Carmine take their girls out on New Year's Eve for a night full of fun and celebration. Unfortunately, things take a turn when Carmine mysteriously disappears. The next day Sammy is informed that Carmine's body had been found.
itunes:author: Sammy "The Bull" Gravano
itunes:subtitle: Sammy and his friend Carmine take their girls out on New Year's Eve for a night full of fun and celebration. Unfortunately, things take a turn when Carmine mysteriously disappears. The next day Sammy is informed that Carmine's body had been found.
